insights.title: Farmers markets go fully contactless
insights.summary: 3 of 4 weekend markets in your area now prefer digital payment. Cash lines are 2â€“4 min longer.

insights.title: Contactless usage up 40% in local cafes
insights.summary: Merchants you visit often have upgraded to tap-to-pay. No need to carry cash for small purchases.

insights.title: Local rewards stack with Visa offers
insights.summary: 12 merchants in your community participate in Visa Local Offers. Earn back on every tap.
insights.impact: More value than cash at same stores.
